MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L9 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Firdale Road, Willowdale Road, Crescent Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.54PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.30PM on 10th March 2021
